author: Repressed Dreams
title: Theory Of A Solution
text: Everything that I dream, I want to make it all come true but it's hard to wake up with you
Es como viajar en los sueños
Volver al pasado, tenerte en mis brazos
Me besas, al cielo me llevas
Me tocas, me haces temblar, me hablas con tus voz angelical
Pero el sol saldrá y desvanecerás.
Everything that I dream, I want to make it all come true but it's hard to wake up with you
I killed my emotions only for you
I promise I will see you every night
For the rest of my life
You and me, forever and ever
I will see you every night for the rest of my life.
